import React from 'react' import Jersey from '../assets/jersey.png' function Merchandise() { return (

MERCHANDISE

HEROIC JERSEY

Feel like part of the team and show your style with this new pro jersey from Heroic. A white jersey with red accents features the timeless Heroic logo sitting proudly on the chest. This jersey is made from a technologically advanced, high quality, lightweight and breathable polyester, ensuring maximum comfort and no distractions during play.

Product Benefits:

  • - Official Heroic product
  • - High density sublimation, design will never crack or peel.
  • - 100% polyester
  • - Sponsors on back and front are subject to change

) } export default Merchandise
